content: 02:36 As you can see on page two of the presentation, we reported revenues of $357 million, which is an increase of 8% over the same period last year. Total revenue for the second quarter was $357 million, an increase of 8% over the prior year or 13% after adjusting for the divestiture of our Collections and Recovery product line last June. 06:12 Software segment revenues in the first quarter were $173 million, up 7% versus the same period last year. 06:59 Our software ARR at the end of the second fiscal quarter of 2022 was $550 million, an 11% increase over the prior year quarter. Our platform ARR was $97 million, representing 18% of our total second quarter ARR and a growth rate of 60% versus the prior year. Our non-platform ARR was $453 million in the first quarter -- sorry, in the second quarter, up 4% from the prior year. Software sales were strong again this quarter with annual contract value bookings of $20.6 million versus $13.3 million in the prior year, an increase of 55%. GAAP net income this quarter was $104 million, up 52% from the prior year quarter. 09:02 Our non-GAAP net income was $124 million for the quarter, up 37% from the same quarter last year. Please go ahead, your line is open. Please go ahead, your line is open. Please go ahead, your line is open. Please go ahead, your line is open. Please go ahead, your line is open.
